column2:
"Looks like an ARKS fighter plane went
down. Luckily we're headed that way.
We'd better rescue them quick!"

"戦闘機が不時着？
進行ルート上ですし
放っておくわけにもいきませんね。"

"/ci3 2 Looks like an ARKS fighter plane went

We'd better rescue them quick!"
